content.text:
# Draft:JCW Battle Royal Championship

}}
The JCW Battle Royal Championship is a professional wrestling championship in Juggalo Championship Wrestling. The current champion is Ricky Morton, who is in his first reign. It was established on February 14, 2025 at a taping of JCW Lunacy episode 22, with Sonny Kiss winning a 12-person battle royal.
